main event: An unidentified object was observed in Elyria, Ohio, on March 20, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as very large with bright lights,It appeared to hover in place before leaving very quickly,The observer used binoculars to get a clearer view of the object,The object displayed several lights that were red, green, and white,The report was deemed insufficient for evaluation by the U.S. Air Force.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with bright lights
witness description: A civilian who observed the object from their home.
